sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"孤单的，寂寞的"之意。
means: lonely ： 强调孤独感，含"渴望和他人在一起"的意味。
alone ： 普通用词，指独自一人的状态，有时含孤寂之意。
desolate ： 语气强烈，强调遭受损失和失去亲人所带来的难以忍受的痛苦。
solitary ： 可指因被遗忘或遗弃而产生的孤独感，也可指人的生性孤僻。

sentence.Network_en: If you're lonely when you're alone, you're in bad company.--Jean Paul Sartre
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你独处时感到寂寞，说明没有把自己陪好。

sentence.Network_en: I would imagine she's quite lonely living on her own.
sentence.Network_cn: 我猜想她一个人过肯定很孤独。

sentence.Network_en: Miserable, and unexpectedly lonely, she went in search of Jean-Paul.
sentence.Network_cn: 内心痛苦、突感寂寞的她去寻找琼－保罗。

entry.def: Someone who is lonely is unhappy because they are alone or do not have anyone they can talk to.

example.ex: ...lonely people who just want to talk...
example.tran: 只想找人倾诉的孤独的人

example.ex: I feel lonelier in the middle of London than I do on my boat in the middle of nowhere.
example.tran: 我身处伦敦市中心比驾船航行于茫茫大海更感到孤单。

entry.tran: （指状态或时期）孤独的，寂寞的，孤零零的
entry.def: A lonely situation or period of time is one in which you feel unhappy because you are alone or do not have anyone to talk to.

example.ex: I desperately needed something to occupy me during those long, lonely nights.
example.tran: 在那一个个漫长、孤单的夜晚，我极需找点事做。

entry.tran: 偏僻的；荒凉的；人迹罕至的
entry.def: A lonely place is one where very few people come.

example.ex: It felt like the loneliest place in the world.
example.tran: 感觉这就像是天底下最荒凉的地方。

sentences.sentence: "he was alone when we met him"
"she is alone much of the time"
"a lonely fisherman stood on a tuft of gravel"

means.word_mean: 2. marked by dejection from being alone;

sentences.sentence: "spent a lonesome hour in the bar"

means.word_mean: 3. separated from or unfrequented by others; remote or secluded;

sentences.sentence: "a trail leading to an unfrequented lake"

auth_sentence.content: They cannot see how lonely they will be.
auth_sentence.res_content: They cannot see how lonely they will be.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They cannot see how lonely they will be.

auth_sentence.content: The one child policy has made children lonely too.
auth_sentence.res_content: The one child policy has made children lonely too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The one child policy has made children lonely too.

auth_sentence.content: Pepper, and I was the Lonely Heart Band.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pepper, and I was the Lonely Heart Band.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pepper, and I was the Lonely Heart Band.

stems_affixes.word_buile: lone[adj.孤独的, 独立的]+ly表形容词→adj.孤独的,寂寞的
one一+ly表形容词→adj.唯一的, 单独的
lonely孤独的,寂寞的+ness表名词→n.孤独, 寂寞

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一次, 从前, 曾经

Sentence.sentence: I've never been lonely in all my life.

sentences.en: The lonely old man was much to be pitied by all of us.
sentences.cn: 那位孤独的老人得到了我们大家的同情。

means.word_mean: 荒凉的, 人迹罕至的

sentences.en: The place is a bit lonely.

jushi.english: The train stopped frequently at lonely little stations, which resulted in a sleepless night.
jushi.chinese: 火车不时在孤寂的小站停下来,这使我一夜难眠。

jushi.english: The lonely old man was much to be pitied by all of us.
jushi.chinese: 那位孤独的老人得到了我们大家的同情。

jushi.english: Thoughts of home and family recurred to the lonely traveller.
jushi.chinese: 对家和亲人的思念重新浮上孤寂游人的心头。
